Title: Establishes a tax credit for the purchase and installation of a qualified video doorbell system on residential properties
Summary: Establishes a tax credit for the purchase and installation of a qualified video doorbell system on residential properties; the amount of such credit shall be equal to the amount expended for the purchase of such qualified video doorbell system, and materials and labor costs properly allocable to on-site preparation, assembly and original installation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for the purchase and installation of a qualified video doorbell system on residential properties
